advance.action: Increase a progress status 1 Power per tier.
advance.description: Make progress, get closer, push forward.

attack.action: Give your target a harmful status.
attack.description: Slash, punch, lay a curse, shoot.

bestow.action: Give yourself or an ally new abilities using tags.

effects.category-ally: For Yourself or for an Ally
effects.category-target: Against an Opponent or a Target

create.action: Create a new object or being using tags.

disrupt.action: Give your target a hindering tag or status.
disrupt.cost: 1 Power per tier, 2 Power per tag.

enhance.action: Give yourself or an ally a helpful status.

extra_feat.cost: 1 Power per additional feature or minor achievement included in the action.
extra_feat.description: Add a feature or minor achievement to an action.

influence.action: Give your target a compelling status.

mitigate.cost: 1 Power per tier; 2 Power per tag.

restore.action: Reduce a harmful status or recover a burnt power tag.
restore.cost: 1 Power per tier 2 Power per tag.

weaken.action: Remove a targetâ€™s useful tag or status.
weaken.cost: 1 Power per tier 2 Power per tag.

settings.skip-roll-moderation-hint: If checked, players will be able to roll without GM moderation.

ui.click-open-context-remove: Click to open sheet, Right-Click to remove.
ui.confirm-delete-content: Are you sure you want to remove this {thing}?
ui.context-remove-all-tags: Right-Click to remove all story tags
ui.dice-roller-hint: Opens the dice roll dialog if a character is attached to the user.
ui.drag-apply: Drag onto Actors or Story Window to apply
ui.error-burning-tag: There was an error trying to burn your tag. Please see the console for more information.
ui.error-conducting-roll: There was an error conducting the roll. Please see the console for more information.
ui.error-no-actor: No actor found. Please make sure the actor exists and is properly configured.
ui.error-no-backpack: No backpack found. Try duplicating the actor to solve this issue.
ui.error-validating-actor: There was an error validating the actor. Please see the console for more information.
ui.error-validating-item: There was an error validating the item. Please see the console for more information.
ui.inc-dec:
Click to increase
Right-Click to decrease
ui.item-transfer-content: Select the tags you want to transfer to your backpack.
ui.moderate-roll-player-hint: The GM is moderating the roll. Please wait for their decision.
ui.name-consequence: Name your Consequence using [tag] to indicate tags, and [tag 0] to indicate statuses.
ui.roll-consequence:
The action succeeds,
but there are Consequences.
ui.roll-failure:
The action fails.
There are Consequences.
ui.roll-gm-moderate: You have received a roll from {name}. Make any necessary adjustments and click 'Roll' to send it back.
ui.roll-moderated: The GM is moderating the roll. Please wait for their decision.
ui.roll-rejected: {name} has rejected the roll. Please make any necessary adjustments, or close the dialog if you did not intend to roll.
ui.roll-success:
The action succeeds.
There are no Consequences.
ui.roll-tracked-hint: Right-Click to post Effects to chat.
ui.roll-tracked-success: You can push your roll by accepting Consequences to get 1 more Power to spend on Effects.
ui.show-tag-window-on-load-hint: If checked, the tag manager will be shown automatically when the game is loaded. You can always click the tag icon to show it manually.
ui.toggle-roll:
Click to add/remove from dice roll.
SHIFT + Click to burn tag on dice roll.
ALT/OPTION + Click to burn/unburn tag.
ui.toggle-weakness-roll: Click to add/remove from dice roll.
ui.warn-incompatible-data: The data you are trying to import is not compatible with this system.
ui.warn-no-character: Please assign a character to your user in the bottom-left player configuration menu.
ui.warn-no-effect-found: The game is misconfigured. The selected effect was not found.
ui.warn-not-owner: You are not the owner of this actor. You cannot edit it.
ui.warn-theme-limit: You have reached the maximum number of themes. Please remove a theme before adding another.
